title: [PSA] This Kled bug can kill you! (dismount animation cancel) 100% repeatable

embed.description: Is it an exploit? Or just a bug? It certainly does cancel the animation.... VVV See all the details below VVV Explanation: Okay so over a year ago I died under a tower 1 auto attack away from a kill and got kind of upset because Kled always seemed to dismount BACKWARDS for some reason...

body:
Here's an explanation that's not in the closed captions The full(er) story is in the description.

There has been a lot a Kled bugs since his release. About 10, but none more frustrating than this one because it TURNS OFF Kleds untarbetable phase when he dismounts. The issue with this is you are essentially stuck in a dismount animation that acts like a root at low health!  
The notorious bug that can kill you.
This bug affected ranked games seemingly at random (challengers like Soulmario). One day the clues all added up and this vid was made

After all this time this finally shows how to not only recreate the bug, but possibly use the animation cancel to get back into the fight faster if desired.


If you want to see ALL the Kled bugs (even ones that can **KILL OTHER CHAMPIONS** that kled fights like poor Yorick XD) the videos of Solmario dying or maybe help out finding solutions like "Skaarlnotfound" did check out the full thread:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/oAvUvnLd-gameplay-kled-has-10-bugs-and-counting-all-listed-with-recreation-some-methods
